ovdesc.p: The various price barriers to a structured note can be defined here and referenced in the SECURITY.MASTER application.
For example, this could be STOP.LOSS ,HIGHER.BARRIER etc.

desc.p: A detailed description of the price barrier is updated here. This description would be visible on screen whenever this price barrier field is referenced in any application.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
